DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : The use endoscopy place metal stent duodenum less invasive surgery treat cancer-related duodenal obstruction may fewer side effect improve recovery . PURPOSE : Phase I/II trial study effectiveness endoscopic placement metal stent treat patient cancer-related obstruction duodenum .
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Placement Metal Stents Treating Patients With Cancer- Related Duodenal Obstruction
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine objective response clinical outcome patient duodenal obstruction secondary malignancy treat enteral Wallstents . - Evaluate efficacy safety treatment patient . - Evaluate quality life patient enteral Wallstent placement . OUTLINE : Patients undergo enteral Wallstent placement endoscope fluoroscopic guidance duodenum . Quality life assess 48 hour 6 month procedure . Patients follow 48 hour , 30 day , 6 month , yearly thereafter death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 20 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Endoscopically confirm localized tumor cause duodenal obstruction All primary tumor type eligible No prior duodenal Wallstents Must symptom gastrointestinal obstruction , include : Inability move bowel , absence flatus , nausea/vomiting , abdominal pain , diarrhea PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : ECOG 03 Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Platelet count great 50,000/mm^3 Hepatic : INR great 1.5 time upper limit normal Renal : Not specify Cardiovascular : No cardiac condition Other : Not pregnant nursing Fertile patient must use effective contraception No significant active infection ( e.g. , pneumonia , peritonitis , wound abscess ) would preclude endoscopy No serious concurrent illness No uncontrolled metabolic disease ( e.g. , diabetes mellitus hypothyroidism ) No dementia , psychiatric disorder , alter mental status would preclude compliance History neoplastic disease allow Veterans Administration patient eligible PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : Prior concurrent chemotherapy allow Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : Prior concurrent radiotherapy allow Surgery : At least 3 week since prior surgery recover
